original_query: SELECT MIN(v.Id) FROM votes as v, posts as p, users as u WHERE v.UserId = u.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND p.PostTypeId=2 AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-26 22:40:26' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 2 AND posts.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-26 22:40:26'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2.UserId=E3.Id)
